Table of Contents

NAME

QccIMGImageExtractFrame - extract a single frame from image cube

SYNOPSIS

#include "libQccPack.h"

int QccIMGImageCubeExtractFrame(const QccIMGImageCube *image_cube, int frame, QccIMGImageComponent *image_component);

DESCRIPTION

QccIMGImageExtractFrame() extracts the single frame indicated by frame from image_cube into image_component, a QccIMGImageComponent(3) structure. image_component must be allocated prior to calling QccIMGImageCubeExtractFrame() and must have the same number of rows and columns as image_cube.

RETURN VALUES

These routines return 0 on success and 1 on error.

SEE ALSO

QccIMGImageCube(3) , QccIMGImageComponent(3) , QccPackIMG(3) , QccPack(3)

AUTHOR
